name: horrogue
description:
Ver1.10: Added the Boss Fight and Win screen.
Ver1.06: Fixed the bug about gate of hell.
Ver1.05: Added the VIT, INT, LUK, SPD and VIS.
Ver1.04: You can morph into a wolf girl.
Ver1.03: Added the Item "Rosario".
Ver1.02: Added the Trap "Tomb Stone".
Ver1.01: Changed the BGM. horrogue is a casual roguelite action game.

The dungeons are made with the procedural generation.
You can play the different maps every times.
If you get the crystals or items, you will be able to strengthen the character.
Go to the gate of hell. Defeat the boss monster!
Now it's beta.
I will develop more. I want to improve this game.
Please let me know what you think.

Dodge the ghosts, avoid the traps and pick a key.
If you have a key, you can open the door to the next floor.
On the full moon of the night, you can defeat the ghosts.
Get the crystals and items and strengthen your character.
Go to the gate of hell. Defeat the boss monster! How to play

You can't attack the enemies. You can only run away.
But on the full moon night, you morph into a wolf girl.
The wolf girl can eat the normal ghosts.
You can strengthen your character.
If your health bar become zero, game is over.

Move: Arrow Keys or ASWD keys.
Pause: P Key.
Back to Menu: L Key.
Some Buttons(Start, back to menu, pause): Mouse Click. 

Key and Door

There is one key and one door in each floor.

Enemy

RedGhost: Normal enemy.
If you get close to it, you will be attacked.
If you are attacked, your health bar will decrease and your field of view will decrease temporarily.
If you reach more floors, they will increase.

YellowGhost: Normal enemy. 
If you get close to it, you will be attacked. 
If you are attacked, your health bar will decrease and your field of view will decrease temporarily and your walk speed will decrease temporarily.
If you reach more floors, they will increase.

PurpleGhost: Normal enemy. 
If you get close to it, you will be attacked. 
If you are attacked, your health bar will decrease and your field of view will decrease temporarily and poisoned temporarily.
If you reach more floors, they will increase.

Zombie: Normal enemy.
If you get close to it, you will be attacked and zombie will disappear.
If you are attacked, your health bar will decrease and your field of view will decrease temporarily.

BigSkelton: Boss enemy.
If you dawdle away your time, it will come.
If you are attacked, your health bar will decrease and your field of view will decrease temporarily.
If you reach more floors, it will come sooner.

Trap

Spears: If you touch them, your health bar will decrease.
Poisons:If you touch them, your health bar will decrease slowly.
Tomb Stone:If you touch them, it will spawn a zombie.
Electric: If you touch them, your speed will decrease temporarily.

Treasure Box

You can open the treasure box. There is one treasure box in each floor.
Heal potion: Your health bar will increase.
Cure potion: Your health bar will increase and detoxicate.
Lantern: Your field of view will increase in the floor. But if you are attacked by enemies, your field of view will decrease.
Rosario:  You will be invincible temporarily.
Moon Fragment: The age of the moon will advance.

Morph

You can morph into a wolf girl on the full moon. The wolf girl can eat normal ghosts.
If you go to next floor, the age of the moon will advance. And if you get a moon fragment from the treasure box, the age of the moon will advance.

Status

You can get a VIT crystal or INT crystal or LUK crystal at the church every floor.
You can get a SPD shoes or VIS  glasses in the well every floor.
VIT: Decrease the damage, increase recovery amount of the potion etc.
INT: Decrease the time of poisoned and numbass. Increase the time of invincible.
LUK: Increase the chance of the moon fragment from the treasure box. Delay the boss skelton appear.
SPD: Increase the speed.
VIS: Decrease the time of darkness when attacked. etc.

Boss Fight

If you enter the gate of hell, you can't return till you defeat the boss monster.
